scheduled_maintenances.name: [RBX2/7][Hosted Private Cloud- Datastores] TOR Switch upgrade

incident_updates.body: Start time : 12/05/2022 04:00 UTC End time : 12/05/2022 07:00 UTC Service impact : There will be a few seconds of Input/Output freeze when the service will do a switchover (2 times) Service improvement: As part of our continuous improvement policy,this change is to upgrade the Switch version.

Start time : 17/05/2022 07:00 UTC End time : 19/02/2022 15:00 UTC Service impact : Zerto replication cut during the maintenance Service improvement : Upgrade Zerto
Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Start time : 10/05/2022 07:00 UTC End time : 12/05/2022 19:00 UTC Service impact : Slowdowns observed on some hosted websites Service improvement : Improving service security and upgrading for future hosted private cloud offerings. We are upgrading the Zerto service to version 9.0
